The color property in CSS is used to set the background color of an element.
The padding property in CSS is used to create space within an element
The display property in CSS can be used to hide an element.

The z-index property in CSS is used to specify the stack order of elements.
The margin property in CSS adds space outside an element's border.
Flexbox is a one-dimensional layout method in CSS.
The background-image property in CSS is used to set an image as the background of an element.
